creditsPerUsage.label: Credits per usage
creditsPerUsage.description: This amount will be deducted once per usage.

creditsPerMinute.label: Credits per minute
creditsPerMinute.description: This amount will be deducted per minute of the session duration.

toast.title: Billing updated
toast.description: The usage-based billing has been updated successfully.

generic.title: Error updating billing
generic.description: The usage-based billing could not be updated. Please try again.
